com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.textures

Class TextureAtlas

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.ProxyObject
      • com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.textures.TextureAtlas

  • public class TextureAtlas
extends ProxyObject
    A texture atlas is a collection of many smaller textures in one big image. This class is used to access textures from such an atlas.
    Author:
    Ekambi

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a region for a subtexture and gives it a name.

      Disposes the atlas texture.
      Texture getTexture(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves a subtexture by name
      java.util.List<Texture> getTextures(java.lang.String prefix)
      Returns all textures that start with a certain string, sorted alphabetically (especially useful for "MovieClip").
      void removeRegion(java.lang.String name)
      Disposes the atlas texture.
